name: Primordial One
desc: The First Descender, who defeated seven Dragon Sovereigns of the world and created people. The Primordial One may be Phanes.

customize.text:
Descenders
The Primordial One is one of the entities from another world, whose wills can rival an entire world.
Shades
The Primordial One created four shining shades and reshaped Teyvat along with them.
Dragon Sovereigns
Before the appearance of the Primordial One, the world was ruled by elemental dragons. After a forty-year war, the dragons were defeated and the seven nations submitted to the First Throne. The Primordial One stole the dragon's authority and later used it for the divine thrones.
Second Who Came
The Second Throne, invaders from another world who destroyed the barrier around Teyvat created by the First Throne and brought people hope for freedom. The war with the Second Descenders brought forbidden knowledge, many plagues, and destruction to Teyvat.
One Who Came After
Severely wounded in the great war of vengeance, the Primordial One had their functions ruined and could no longer use their absolute authority to suppress the original order of this world. To continue to subdue and control the resentments and loathing of the world, the First Throne and one who came after created the

customize.name: Gnosis
customize.desc: Gnoses are internal magical foci that each of The Seven possesses, allowing them to resonate directly with Celestia itself and serving as an emblem of their status. The Gnoses were created from the remains of the Third Descender.

Master of the Four Shades
Master of the Heavens
